'''"Mirror-Reflection Lyre"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Mirror-Reflection Lyre" is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of [[The Realms Rocked]] Battle Pass.
